name: mcp-server-example-remote
description: MCP Feature Reference Server with OAuth - Unified Implementation

scripts.dev:external: concurrently "AUTH_MODE=auth_server PORT=3001 BASE_URI=http://localhost:3001 tsx watch src/index.ts" "sleep 3 && AUTH_MODE=external AUTH_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:3001 tsx watch --inspect src/index.ts"
scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-static && npm run build:apps
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p dist/static dist/modules/auth/static && cp -r src/static/* dist/static/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp src/modules/auth/static/mcp.png dist/modules/auth/static/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.start:external: concurrently "AUTH_MODE=auth_server PORT=3001 BASE_URI=http://localhost:3001 node dist/index.js" "sleep 3 && AUTH_MODE=external AUTH_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:3001 node dist/index.js"
